name: Harbour Room (Grand Oriental Hotel)
description: One of the best views anywhere in the city or the region, in an incredibly under-rated colonial property.
tip: In its current incarnation the Harbour Room is not a gourmands paradise, the food is OK and the drinks need some work. 50 ml shots of Arrack with ginger ale are the way to go here, maybe a gin and tonic - or a bottle of something that you mix yourself- the bar staff are a little confused by cocktails. Also, hidden at the back of the harbour room is a terrace with the best views in Colombo - its nicer out here than inside so come and enjoy the smell of the sea and the sound of the port.
review:
One of the best views anywhere in the city or the region, in an incredibly under-rated colonial property.

කරදිය සුළඟ විඳගෙන ආහාර ගන්න කැමති  සැමට.

முன்பொருகாலத்தில் கொழும்பில் இரவுநேர களியாட்டங்களுக்கு பிரபலமான இடங்களாக கிரான்ட் ஒரியன்டல் ஹொட்டேலும் (GOH) கோல்போஸ் ஹோட்டலும் இருந்தன. அதுவும் கொழும்பு துறைமுகத்தை அடையும் பயணிகளுக்கு இந்த வெள்ளை நிற கட்டடம் ஒரு சொர்க்கபுரிதான்.
